H0.text: Extreme water pressure is what organisms that live deep in the ocean must be able to withstand.

H1.text: The sun is what organisms that live deep in the ocean must be able to withstand.

H2.text: Significant water pressure is what organisms that live deep in the ocean must be able to withstand.

H3.text: Tsunamis are what organisms that live deep in the ocean must be able to withstand.

A4.text: The hydrostatic pressure at a depth Δz is p = ρ g Δz + p0, indicating that pressure increases with depth.

A5.text: Hydrostatic pressure is the static pressure exerted at a point of interest by the weight of a fluid column above the point.
